Package nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils.conversion

Interface Summary
Converter<T> Generic interface for data conversion
Transformer<Input,Output> Utility class used to transform an object into another
 

Class Summary
AccountOwnerConverter Converts between an id and an account owner.
AmountConverter Converter for amounts
BooleanConverter A converter for boolean
CalendarConverter Converter for Calendar type
CardNumberConverter A converter for card numbers
CoercionConverter<T> A converter that uses coercion to convert data
CoercionHelper Class used to convert from a data type to another
CollectionCountConverter Converter for returning collection sizes
CustomFieldConverter Converter for custom field value collections
FixedLengthNumberConverter<T extends Number> Converts a string to number with fixed position decimals.
FormatOnlyConverter<T> A Converter which only supports formatting, that is, the Converter.toString(Object) method
HtmlConverter Used to handle HTML formatted values, removing script tags and converting paragraphs into line breaks
IdConverter Converter for entity ids, converting non-positive numbers to null
KeyToHelpNameConverter A converter that converts a resource bundle key (like monkey.fool.cow.bear) to a helpfile name (like monkeyFoolCowBear).
LocaleConverter Converter for Locale instances
MessageConverter Looks up messages for converting
NumberConverter<T extends Number> Converter for formatted numbers
PermissionConverter Converts a string of the form PermissionSimpleClassName.permissionName to the corresponding permission and vice versa
ReferenceConverter<T extends Entity> Converter for entity references
SetConverter<T extends Set<?>> You can use this class to split a string by a separator and return a Set instance to from that split.
StringTrimmerConverter A converter that trims strings and remove all html/xml markup tags
TimeZoneConverter Converter for TimeZones.
UnitsConverter Converter for units
 

Exception Summary
ConversionException An exception while performing databinding
